title: The Scavenger's Dilemma
trigger_condition: Entering an abandoned industrial zone at night
description: You stumble upon a flickering light coming from a half-collapsed warehouse. Inside, you find a lone scavenger desperately trying to pry open a reinforced storage container. They notice you and nervously offer a deal: help them open it, and you can take your pick of the contentsâ€”but they get first choice.

choices.option: Agree to help and split the loot
choices.consequence: Gain a random rare item, but lose 15 Stamina from the effort.

choices.option: Threaten the scavenger and take everything
choices.consequence: Gain all items from the container, but suffer a -10 Reputation with nearby factions.

choices.option: Ignore the scavenger and leave the area
choices.consequence: No gains or losses, but the opportunity is lost.

choices.option: Attempt to open the container alone after scaring the scavenger off
choices.consequence: 50% chance to gain all items, 50% chance to trigger a trap, losing 20 Health.
